Title: 21. Iris van Herpen: Sculpting the Senses
Description: 15th Mar-10th Aug  Image adapted from: @artsciencemuseumsg via Instagram The visionary Dutch fashion designer brings her creations to Singapore with an exhibition called Iris van Herpen: Sculpting the Senses . Famously known for pioneering the use of 3D printing to create fashionable pieces, she blends science and art in her creations. She has brought over 140 looks and accessories, drawing inspiration from the natural world.
